bioconda.name: scoary
bioconda.summary: Microbial pan-GWAS using the output from Roary

biocontainers.name: scoary
biocontainers.summary: Pan-genome wide association studies and  is designed to take the gene_presence_absence.csv file from roary as well as a traits file created by the user and calculate the assocations between all genes in the accessory genome (all genes that are present in i genomes where 1 < i < n) and the traits. it reports a list of genes sorted by strength of association per trait.

biotools.summary: Pan-genome wide association studies and  is designed to take the gene_presence_absence.csv file from Roary as well as a traits file created by the user and calculate the assocations between all genes in the accessory genome (all genes that are present in i genomes where 1 < i < N) and the traits. It reports a list of genes sorted by strength of association per trait.

bioschemas.name: Scoary
bioschemas.summary: Pan-genome wide association studies and  is designed to take the gene_presence_absence.csv file from Roary as well as a traits file created by the user and calculate the assocations between all genes in the accessory genome (all genes that are present in i genomes where 1 < i < N) and the traits. It reports a list of genes sorted by strength of association per trait.

galaxy.summary: Scoary calculates the assocations between all genes in the accessory genome and the traits.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Pan-genome wide association studies and  is designed to take the gene_presence_absence.csv file from Roary as well as a traits file created by the user and calculate the assocations between all genes in the accessory genome (all genes that are present in i genomes where 1 < i < N) and the traits. It reports a list of genes sorted by strength of association per trait.
